EmailTemplate.name: Storage Only Application 1
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar + Storage Installer Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Account.Name},
Thanks for your interest in partnering with BlueWave!
To get started, please fill out the Solar + Storage Installer Application below. The application will ask for more details about your storage interests, as well as other relevent company information. It will also ask you to upload copies of relevent manufacturer certifications.
A member of our BlueWave Quality Control Team will be in touch within 24 hours of completing your application.
Click here to start your application
Thanks for your interest and we look forward to a bright future ahead!
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 888.817.2703 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
